traits.locale_text:
Base Armour Property: +25 Strength
Refreshes cooldown of {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}Go For the Throat{/g} after a kill

languages.text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}Go For the Throat{/g} is reset. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

Base Armour Property: +25 Strength
Refreshes cooldown of {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}Go For the Throat{/g} after a kill

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}Go For the Throat{/g} is reset. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}Go For the Throat{/g} is reset. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}Go For the Throat{/g} is reset. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者が敵を殺すと、{g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}喉噛み{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}がリセットされる。 基本アーマー特性: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} +25。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}Go For the Throat{/g} is reset. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が敵を殺すと、{g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}喉噛み{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}がリセットされる。 基本アーマー特性: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} +25。

languages.text: Когда персонаж убивает противника, период {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}восстановления{/g} способности {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}Вцепиться в глотку{/g} завершается. Базовое свойство: +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}Go For the Throat{/g} is reset. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж убивает противника, процесс {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}восстановления{/g} способности {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}Вцепиться в глотку{/g} обнуляется. Базовое свойство: +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.

Когда персонаж убивает противника, процесс {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}восстановления{/g} способности {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}Вцепиться в глотку{/g} обнуляется. Базовое свойство: +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.

Когда персонаж убивает противника, период {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}восстановления{/g} способности {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}Вцепиться в глотку{/g} завершается. Базовое свойство: +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.

languages.text: Tötet der Träger einen Gegner, wird die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} von {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}An die Kehle gehen{/g} zurückgesetzt. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}Go For the Throat{/g} is reset. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tötet der Träger einen Gegner, wird die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} von {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}An die Kehle gehen{/g} zurückgesetzt. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, her düşman öldürdüğünde {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}Gırtlağına Çök{/g} kabiliyetinin {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}dolum süresi{/g} sıfırlanır. Taban zırh özelliği: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}Go For the Throat{/g} is reset. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Giyen kişi, her düşman öldürdüğünde {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}Gırtlağına Çök{/g} kabiliyetinin {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}dolum süresi{/g} sıfırlanır. Taban zırh özelliği: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g}.

languages.text: Dès que le porteur élimine un adversaire, le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g} de la capacité {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}Attaque à la gorge{/g} est réinitialisé. Propriété d'armure de base : +25 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}Go For the Throat{/g} is reset. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Dès que le porteur élimine un adversaire, le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g} de la capacité {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}Attaque à la gorge{/g} est réinitialisé. Propriété d'armure de base : +25 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}.

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador mata a un enemigo, se reinicia el {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} de {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}A la garganta{/g}. Propiedad básica de armadura: +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}Go For the Throat{/g} is reset. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador mata a un enemigo, se reinicia el {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} de {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}A la garganta{/g}. Propiedad básica de armadura: +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者击杀敌人时，都会重置{g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}直取咽喉{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}。 基础护甲特性：+25{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}Go For the Throat{/g} is reset. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者击杀敌人时，都会重置{g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}直取咽喉{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}。 基础护甲特性：+25{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}。
